New Portfolio Redesign

My portfolio was in serious need of an update. Here's what I did to make it better.

Still in progress

Here's a quick overview of what I'll be covering:

  • How I decided on the requirements for this project and and used Trello to keep track of them. You can see my progress in real time on this Trello Board.
  • How I set up my development environment and deployment process with VS Code, GitHub, and Netflify.
  • My process for getting to this UI design, including layout, content, color scheme, etc. The UI was designed in Adobe XD. I'll also cover about how I set up SASS variables and mixins for color and spacing progression.

Still interested?
